speakers.name: Josh Emerson
speakers.description: Fonts look great on high dpi displays, but bitmap images, not so much. Josh Emerson will discuss a few techniques for achieving resolution independence on your site including asset fonts, where your sites icons are stored inside a web font, and SVG graphics for vectors that can be interactive.

speakers.name: Paul Lloyd
speakers.topic: The edge of the Web redux
speakers.description: Graphic designers have long honed their craft to meet the specific constraints of television. As web designers begin to understand the true nature of our own medium, isnâ€™t about time we did the same?
